introduction.heading: Introduction
content: At {APP_NAME}, operated by {COMPANY_NAME}, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines our practices regarding the collection, use, and protection of your information when you use our service.
By using {APP_NAME}, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

sections.heading: Information Collection
content: {APP_NAME} is designed for maximum user privacy. We collect minimal information necessary to provide our service:

items: Usage statistics (game plays, page views, interaction data)
Technical information (browser type, device information, IP addresses for security)
Account information (cryptographic key pairs for authentication - NO email, phone, or personal contact information)

content: We do NOT collect:

items: Email addresses
Phone numbers
Real names or personal identifiers
Physical addresses
Payment information (tipping is handled by third-party platforms)
Any personally identifiable information beyond usage statistics

sections.heading: KeyPair Authentication
content: {APP_NAME} uses cryptographic key pairs for authentication. This means:

items: No email or phone verification is required
No personal contact information is stored
Account security is based on cryptographic keys only
You are responsible for maintaining the security of your keys

content: If you lose your keys, your account and all associated data cannot be recovered. {COMPANY_NAME} cannot reset accounts or recover lost keys.

sections.heading: Use of Information
content: Your information is used exclusively for:

items: Providing and maintaining the Service
Account authentication and security
Improving platform performance and user experience
Generating aggregated usage statistics (no personal identification)

content: We do NOT sell or rent your data to third parties. Your usage statistics are used only for internal analytics and service improvement.

sections.heading: Third-Party Services
content: {APP_NAME} uses third-party services that may collect information:

items: Ad Networks: Google AdSense, Mediavine, AdThrive, Ezoic, and Rumble (for advertising)
Hosting and Infrastructure: Convex (for data storage and backend services)
Tipping Platforms: PayPal, Patreon, and others (users may link, but we do not collect payment data)

content: These third-party services have their own privacy policies. We encourage you to review them. {COMPANY_NAME} is not responsible for the privacy practices of third-party services.
Ad networks may use cookies and tracking technologies. See the "Cookies and Tracking" section for details.

sections.heading: Data Sharing
content: {COMPANY_NAME} does NOT share your personal information with third parties except:

items: As necessary to provide the Service (e.g., with hosting providers like Convex)
With advertising networks (for serving ads - see Third-Party Services)
When required by law or legal process
To protect the rights, property, or safety of {COMPANY_NAME}, users, or others

content: We do NOT sell or rent your data to anyone. We do NOT share your usage statistics with third parties for marketing purposes.

sections.heading: Data Retention
content: {COMPANY_NAME} retains usage statistics and platform data indefinitely to:

items: Maintain service continuity and account functionality
Provide historical analytics and platform insights
Support ongoing service improvements

content: Cart data, user profiles, and game content are retained as long as the Service operates, unless deleted by the user or removed for Terms of Service violations.
Upon account termination (voluntary or for violations), cart ownership may be transferred to {COMPANY_NAME}, and data may be retained as part of the Platform.

sections.heading: Cookies and Tracking
content: {APP_NAME} and our advertising partners use cookies and tracking technologies:

items: Essential cookies for platform functionality (authentication, preferences)
Advertising cookies from ad networks (Google AdSense, Mediavine, AdThrive, Ezoic, Rumble)
Analytics cookies for usage statistics (no personal identification)

content: Ad networks may use cookies to:

items: Display relevant advertisements
Track ad performance and prevent fraud
Provide aggregated analytics to advertisers

content: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling cookies may affect platform functionality and ad display.

sections.heading: Data Security
content: {COMPANY_NAME} implements security measures to protect your information:

items: Cryptographic authentication (no passwords to breach)
Secure connections (HTTPS) for all data transmission
Regular security updates and monitoring
Access controls and authentication protocols

content: However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your data, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

sections.heading: Children's Privacy
content: {APP_NAME} does not knowingly collect personal information from children under any specific age. However, we do not require age verification.
If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided information to {APP_NAME}, please contact us at {APP_EMAIL_PRIVACY} with "Support" in the subject line.
Since we use KeyPair authentication and do not collect personal contact information, children's privacy is inherently protected by our minimal data collection practices.

sections.heading: Your Rights
content: You have the following rights regarding your information:

items: Right to access your usage statistics and account data
Right to request deletion of your account (note: cart ownership may transfer to {COMPANY_NAME} upon deletion)
Right to control cookie preferences through your browser
Right to stop using the Service at any time

content: Since we do not collect email addresses or personal contact information, account management is done through the Platform interface.

sections.heading: Changes to This Policy
content: {COMPANY_NAME} may update this Privacy Policy from time to time.
We will notify users of significant changes by posting the new policy on this page with an updated "Last Updated" date.
Continued use of our Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
It is your responsibility to review this Privacy Policy periodically.

contact.heading: Contact Us
content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
Please include "Support" in the subject line for general inquiries.

footer.text: This Privacy Policy is effective as of January 15, 2025 and will remain in effect except with respect to any changes in its provisions in the future.
